title: Topaz Texture Effects Full v.1.1.1 + Crack (Windows 64-bit only)
description:
Topaz Texture Effects Full v.1.1.1 (Windows 64-bit only)

Who says it has to take time to create an awe-inspiring image?
With the ability to quickly achieve a variety of textured, toned, and lighting effects, Topaz Texture Effects allows you to do in minutes what could take hours in other editing software.

Texture Effects comes with over 325 high-resolution textures and assets!
This means no more scouring the web for that perfect texture for your image!
This also means that Texture Effects is a large download that includes BOTH the program AND the library of assets.

Topaz Texture Effects System Requirements

Topaz Texture Effects is a demanding application that may not work well on older or weaker systems.  Here are a few guidelines to ensure you can enjoy the application fully.

Operating System Requirements: 

Windows (32bit not supported):

- Windows 7 x64
- Windows 8 x64
- Windows 8.1 x64
- Windows 10 x64

Graphics Card Requirements:

- Support for OpenGL 3.2 or higher.
- At least 1GB of dedicated memory to open the application.  2GB or more is recommended for optimal performance.
- Up to date drivers on Windows: Updating Your Display Drivers in Windows

Run the Installer:

- Windows Installer: Follow the prompts to install the application

The program will then install as a standalone application by default to:

Win: C:Program FilesTopaz LabsTopaz Texture Effects

IMMEDIATELY RUN THE APPLICATION AS A STANDALONE!  THIS IS A REQUIRED STEP TO CONFIGURE THE APPLICATION.  IF YOU FAIL TO DO THIS, YOU WILL NOT SEE ANY PRESETS OR ASSETS IN THE APPLICATION WHEN USED AS A PLUG-IN!

Plugin Compatibility:

To use Topaz Texture Effects as a plugin, first run the standalone program via the directories listed above.  This is a one-time setup that require to use the software as a plugin.  If the plugin does not automatically configure when you run it the first time, click the link for your host editor below.

Texture Effects can then be accessed as a plugin via:

- Photoshop CS4+
- Photoshop Creative Cloud (CC, CC 2014, CC 2015)
- Photoshop Elements 6+
- Serif PhotoPlus X
- Corel Paintshop Pro X
- Photoshop Lightroom
- photoFXlab
- Not compatible with Fusion Express

Homepage https://www.topazlabs.com/textureeffects
